TestCase.name: q6
TestCase.Resource: select sum(l_extendedprice * l_discount) as revenue from lineitem where l_shipdate >= date '1994-01-01' and l_shipdate < date '1994-01-01' + interval '1' year and l_discount between 0.08 - 0.01 and 0.08 + 0.01 and l_quantity < 24;

RwBatchGather BatchHashAgg(group=[{}], revenue=[SUM($0)]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}]) BatchHashAgg(group=[{}], revenue=[SUM($0)]) BatchProject($f0=[*($1, $2)]) BatchFilter(condition=[AND(>=($3, 1994-01-01), <($3, +(1994-01-01, 12:INTERVAL YEAR)), OR(AND(>=($2, -(8E-2:DOUBLE, 1E-2:DOUBLE)), <=($2, +(8E-2:DOUBLE, 1E-2:DOUBLE))), AND(>=($2, +(8E-2:DOUBLE, 1E-2:DOUBLE)), <=($2, -(8E-2:DOUBLE, 1E-2:DOUBLE)))), <($0, 24))]) BatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, lineitem]], columns=[l_quantity,l_extendedprice,l_discount,l_shipdate])
